definitions: To control the operations of; to manage or govern.
To show or tell someone the way to a place.
To aim or point something in a particular direction.
To instruct someone to do something.
To supervise the making of a film or play.
examples: She will direct the new project.
Can you direct me to the nearest post office?
He directed his gaze towards the horizon.
The teacher directed the students to open their books.
